content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide detailed instructions for assembly.

Analysis of Main Target Image:
The image shows two separate structures:

1. Left Structure:
- Two orange cylindrical pillars
- Two yellow rectangular blocks placed horizontally across the pillars
- Orange triangular top piece on the taller pillar

2. Right Structure:
- Red arch-based construction with yellow rectangular block
- Red house-like top with triangular roof
- Base consists of two red arch pieces

Block Count and Layers:
Total blocks used: ~10 blocks
Layers: 2-3 layers in each structure

Required blocks from dictionary and assembly order:

Left Structure:
{
Step1: Move block with index 7 (first orange cylinder)
Step2: Move block with index 7 (second orange cylinder)
Step3: Move block with index 6 (longer yellow rectangular block)
Step4: Move block with index 5 (shorter yellow rectangular block)
Step5: Move block with index 11 (orange triangular top piece)
}

Right Structure:
{
Step6: Move block with index 1 (first red arch piece)
Step7: Move block with index 2 (second red arch piece)
Step8: Move block with index 4 (yellow rectangular block)
Step9: Move block with index 10 (red rectangular block for house base)
Step10: Move block with index 11 (red triangular roof pieces)
}
